title: VAERS All Vaccine Table Schema
description: Schema for combined VAERS vaccine data from all years

VAX_TYPE.description: Type of vaccine using CDC vaccine abbreviation (e.g., COVID19, FLU3, HEPB, MMR)

VAX_DOSE_SERIES.description: Dose number in vaccination series (1, 2, 3, 4, etc. or UNK for unknown)

VAX_ROUTE.description: Route of administration (IM=intramuscular, SC=subcutaneous, IN=intranasal, etc.)

VAX_SITE.description: Site of administration (LA=left arm, RA=right arm, etc.)

ORDER.description: Order of vaccine administration if multiple vaccines given during same encounter

source_file.description: Original CSV filename this record came from (e.g., '2024VAERSVAX.csv')
